title: Rename company to Electric Light and add uploaded logo

requirements.text: Update all visible company/brand name text across the home page from “SensorTech Electric” to “Electric Light”.

quotes: change the company name to electric light.

acceptanceCriteria: About section heading displays “About Electric Light”.
Footer copyright line displays “© <current year> Electric Light. All rights reserved.”

requirements.text: Add the uploaded logo image (Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png) to the frontend as a static asset and display it in the site branding area (next to the company name) in both the header and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: The file Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png is available under frontend/public/assets/generated and can be loaded via the URL /assets/generated/Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png.
Header shows the logo image next to “Electric Light”, with appropriate sizing so it fits within the existing header height on mobile and desktop.
Footer shows the logo image next to “Electric Light”, consistent with header branding.
Logo includes meaningful alt text in English (e.g., “Electric Light logo”).

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title to reflect the new company name “Electric Light”.

quotes: change the company name to electric light.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the site as a single static home page; do not introduce backend dependencies for logo delivery.
nonGoals: Changing contact email addresses, phone numbers, or other placeholder contact details.
Redesigning the overall layout or adding new sections beyond placing the logo in existing branding areas.
